title: IdillAt-tuNaiyAga
sahitya:
IdillAt-tuNaiyAga irukka vENum murugA sADum un kara vElum ADum mayilum enakku


anupallavi

  pADu pala paDum pOdu vADi varundum manadODu nADi vandu unnaDiyai nAn aDaindiDum pOdu


caraNam    shOdanai aDutta pOdum vEdanai maDutta pOdum nAthanE murugA undan pAdam paNiyum endanai
bhUtalamIdinil enda tIdum vandu aNugAdu pAdukAttiDak-kOrum pEdaikkini eppOdum
